headline: Best Buy Ads Canada Partners with Rokt to Deliver Highly Relevant Customer Experiences for the Holidays and Beyond
summary: Rokt, the leading ecommerce technology company using machine learning and AI to make transactions more relevant to each shopper, today announced it has partnered with Best Buy Ads Canada ahead of the holiday season to deliver curated transaction experiences to the company's online customers. Best Buy Ads Canada will use Rokt's technology to power highly relevant messages from third-party brands, whose products and services the company does not directly sell itself, on the confirmation page of th
